issue.title: [CF 543] Options out of date
issue.body:
Hello. Just installed TMW 6.0.1 however I can't configure it because I keep getting the error Tellmewhen_options is out of date.  Tell Me When shows as current in the add on screen, TMW options shows as out of date.

I've removed both TMW and TMW options folders from WOW/Interface/Add Ons directory, reinstalled TMW 6.0.1 and encountered the same problem.

I removed the Tellmewhen.lua files from the WTF directory, re-installed and encountered the same problem.

Not sure what to try next.  Thank you.


> Posted by CurseForge user Aimless559 | Imported from CurseForge issue #543 | Raw

comments.body:
You need to enable the "Load out of date addons" setting in the addon panel at the character select screen until I can push a fix.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Should be fixed in r556.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
